project1.title: Movie Maker
project1.description: Movie Maker is a SPA for producers to see if they can afford to make a movie, given the cost of each item they'd like to include.
project1.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Local Weather
project2.description: Local Weather exemplifies the use of an API and implementation of full CRUD using Firebase.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Version Control with Github

project3.title: GameSphere
project3.description: GameSphere is an application for keeping track of which video games you own, which game you want, and which games you've played.
project3.technologiesUsed: React, JSX, jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Version Control with Github

project4.title: Treehouse Cagematch
project4.description: This is a product and technical description for the project
project4.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github
